text: Motion
Fan Mail

"I really love the fashionable Mamimi!
I'm always cheering for you!!"
Motion

"I'm looking forward to the live!
I can't wait to meet Mamimi♡♡"
(hmmmmm....)

(A notebook full of messages from fans...
Everyone is thinking about this sort of stuff, huh?)

(...Ah, this one,
They especially used a purple pen for me)
Mamimi, you're being rather enthusiastic.
... Eh
You know, about that notebook

...those are notes from work
that you're reading, right?
Eh, no, they're not actually.

Huh,
Then what is that notebook for?
Motion

Ah,
Actually, yeah it is.
"As I expected" ...?

Haha
Then it's not like you need to hide anything.
That notebook, what sort of stuff is in it?

I might be able to help with something in there.
Could you show it to me?
No, absolutely not.
...This, is actually a notebook from school, so...

It's full of classified information
and I have a duty of confidentiality, so...
Just now, you said it was for work, didn't you!?
...tch.
Clicking your tongue...!?

Well, if you're trying this hard to conceal it...
if must be a notebook you really don't want seen...
... that's right.

Ah, I've got it!
This notebook is actually...

Full of memos for pranks your planning
to pull on me, isn't it!?
Mhm....

I see, that explains why you
were so happy while you were reading it.
Eh?
...was I so happy while reading it...?

Eh...
Well, it looked like that to me, at least...

Well, then even more,
there's no way I'm letting you see it, you know.
Ugh...

Producer, instead of worrying about this notebook,
could you start thinking about strategies to avoid pranks?

Because, one of these days, I might just take the most amazing prank 
that I've writtent in this book, and pull it on you.
